featured.text: The manager of the company was sued for ______ abusing his colleagues, calling them “hopeless losers.” (A) verbally (B) dominantly (C) legitimately (D)

definition.zh_def: 口頭上，透過言語表達的方式。
definition.en_def: In a spoken manner; using words rather than written or non-verbal communication.
definition.example: She verbally expressed her concerns during the meeting.
